About the Company: Paul Merchants Ltd (PML)started in the year 1991 with its founder acquiring an existing Company known as Brite Agro Mills Ltd from its then promoters, which was originally incorporated in the year 1984. Before putting it on the mercurial path of growth, the name of the Company was changed to Paul Merchants Limited, a name which became synonymous with Trust, Quality, Assurance and Integrity in the following years. The saga which started with few people getting together to offer services with a difference, ultimately unfolded into a large conglomerate having diversified interests in Forex, International Money Transfer, Entertainment Industry (Satellite TV), Distribution of Telecommunication Services, Tours, Travels and Holidays Packages and Air Ticketing over a period of time. The Company is a Public Limited Company with its scrips listed on Delhi Stock Exchange. The Head office of the Company is at Chandigarh.
